name: StorageMart
0:
”Alexa, ask StorageMart what size unit I need”
”Alexa, ask StorageMart what size unit I need for a 3 bedroom house.”
”Alexa, ask StorageMart how do I pay my bill”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: storage mart
des:
StorageMart is here to help answer all your self storage questions:
• Get help with finding the right storage unit size
• Ask about StorageMart policies
• Get answers to your general storage questions
• And stay on top of the latest StorageMart updates

Coming Soon...
• Expanded answer library
• Location-specific details including contact details 
• Tips on making the most of your self storage space
• Send feedback to your store or our corporate office

---------
StorageMart
https://www.storage-mart.com

What would you do with an extra room in your house? What would an extra office or warehouse space mean for your business? Are you ready to reclaim your driveway and securely store your car, boat, or RV?

StorageMart is here for all of life's transitions, helping you when you move, renovate, reorganize, travel, expand, downsize, or grow your business. If you need temporary, short-term, seasonal, or long-term storage, we have a solution that is right for you.

Questions/Comments/Problems?
Please reach out to voice@storage-mart.com
